title: Drawing, "Button Design: Cocktail Hour"
description: 8 drawings on a single sheet of paper: images of glasses of cocktails (e.g. Old Fashioned, wine, champagne, Manhattan, cordial, scotch)  and 1 scratched-out drawing of beer mug, and pencilled inscriptions.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Button Design: Cocktail Hour".
21.6 x 12.2 cm (8 1/2 x 4 13/16 in. ). Bequest of Marion Weeber Welsh. 2006-2-103.
